tr.t-if: flyash.initial_setting_time_visible and (flyash.initial_setting_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or flyash.initial_setting_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl) and not fromEln

flyash.soundness_visible and (flyash.expansion_soundness_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or flyash.expansion_soundness_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl) and not fromEln
flyash.specigic_gravity_visible and (flyash.average_specific_gravity_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or flyash.average_specific_gravity_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl) and not fromEln
flyash.fineness_blaine_visible and (flyash.fineness_blaine_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or flyash.fineness_blaine_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl) and not fromEln
flyash.lime_reactivity_visible and (flyash.lime_reactivity_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or flyash.lime_reactivity_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl) and not fromEln
flyash.compressive_visible and (flyash.compressive_strength_of_sample_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or flyash.compressive_strength_of_sample_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl) and not fromEln
